tool_description: Add iTunes and Mac Store search fields to your app.
name: iTunes
title: iTunes

api_list.name: searchMovies

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The two-letter country code for the store you want to search.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The text string you want to search for.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language, English or Japanese, you want to use when returning search results. Specify the language using the five-letter codename. The default is en_us (English).

optional_parameters.name: attribute
optional_parameters.description: The attribute you want to search for in the stores, one of actorTerm, genreIndex, artistTerm, shortFilmTerm, producerTerm, ratingTerm, directorTerm, releaseYearTerm, featureFilmTerm, movieArtistTerm, movieTerm, ratingIndex, descriptionTerm.

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: The type of results you want returned, one of movieArtist, movie.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results you want the iTunes Store to return. In range 1 - 200.The default is 50.

api_list.name: searchEbooks

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The text string you want to search for.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The two-letter country code for the store you want to search.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results you want the iTunes Store to return. In range 1 - 200.The default is 50.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language, English or Japanese, you want to use when returning search results. Specify the language using the five-letter codename. The default is en_us (English).

api_list.name: getContentByAmgAlbumId
api_list.description: Look up an album by its AMG Album ID

required_parameters.name: amgAlbumId
required_parameters.description: AMG Album identifier or comma separated Ids.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter country code for the store you want to search.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results you want the iTunes Store to return. In range 1 - 200.The default is 50.

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: The type of results you want returned, relative to the specified media type. For example: movieArtist for a movie media type search. The default is the track entity associated with the specified media type.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language, English or Japanese, you want to use when returning search results. Specify the language using the five-letter codename. The default is en_us (English).

optional_parameters.name: attribute
optional_parameters.description: The attribute you want to search for in the stores, relative to the specified media type. For example, if you want to search for an artist by name specify entity=allArtist&attribute=allArtistTerm. In this example, if you search for term=maroon, iTunes returns “Maroon 5” in the search results, instead of all artists who have ever recorded a song with the word "maroon" in the title.

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: The text string you want to search for.

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description: The media type you want to search for. The default is all.

api_list.name: getContentByAmgArtistId

required_parameters.name: amgArtistId
required_parameters.description: Array of AMG Artist Id

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: The type of results you want returned, relative to the specified media type. For example: movieArtist for a movie media type search. The default is the track entity associated with the specified media type.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter country code for the store you want to search.

optional_parameters.description: The number of search results you want the iTunes Store to return. In range 1 - 200.The default is 50.

For example, if you want to search for an artist by name specify entity=allArtist&attribute=allArtistTerm. In this example, if you search for term=maroon, iTunes returns “Maroon 5” in the search results, instead of all artists who have ever recorded a song with the word "maroon" in the title.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language, English or Japanese, you want to use when returning search results. Specify the language using the five-letter codename. The default is en_us (English).
